item.title: Bootcamp Learning Objectives
item.description: Day 1 Students will: Receive a computer Create a GitHub account Understand that file and folders can be saved locally1 Understand the basics of HTML Document structure What is a tag? Indentation Log in to freeCodeCamp and complete steps 1-10 of the (New) Responsive Web Design’s first project, Learn HTML by Building a Cat Photo App Day 2 Students will: Be able to manage expectations as a software developer Know how to efficiently search for answers using the internet Complete steps 11-25 of freeCodeCamp’s (New) Responsive Web Design course’s first project, Learn HTML by Building a Cat Photo App Day 3 Students will:
